channel.title: Client serious Problem
channel.description: I got one problem i have Source private server 317 is working perfectly. I have downloaded client to play on my server when i try to compile it it says u dont have java installed or when i press run client the black box pops up and then hide. But i already have JAVA installed !!!!!!!!!! please help please very need help thx

item.title: Client serious Problem
item.dc:creator: @DemonsworldOwner DemonsworldOwner
item.description:
@DemonsworldOwner wrote:

It’s the complier ur using thats messed up.
Heres one thats simple and works for everyone.

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Read full topic
